short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps you to summarize news pages in 11 different languages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TheGist allows users to summarize news present in web pages. To use it, the user just needs to open a web page containing some sort of news and then click on TheGist icon in order to get a summary.

The goal is to help people to save some time and make them read only the essential.

It supports 11 different languages: English, Portuguese, Spanish, Italian, German, Danish, Finnish, Dutch, Norwegian, Swedish and Turkish.

Some pages cannot be summarized. TheGist is made for news pages.

TheGist is free to use.
